1692150.name: Wolf At Evergreen
1692150.description:
** A Research-Based VR Demo from 2021 **

This VR experience was made as a part of the research component of a Master's degree for Rebecca Kerr with special thanks given to Curtin University and the talented voice actors who helped bring the characters to life.

The initial release was submitted as part of the degree, with subsequential updates to improve user interactions and any bugs.

******

Please Note: As of July 14, 2022, this demo has received its final update and will not receive further updates. It remains available for all to enjoy in its current state. A big thank you to all those who supported this project!

******

ABOUT THE EXPERIENCE

Wolf At Evergreen (originally Unnatural Freaks) is a VR interactive narrative experience, where you play as Frankie, an investigator who's a part of an online vlog series. Frankie’s role is to investigate rumours of supernatural/paranormal experiences to determine their truth and then make a video log about it.

In this demo, Frankie investigates several werewolf sightings in the small town of Evergreen. By talking with the townspeople and exploring the museum, clues will emerge.
